## vision\_v1.Schema$PurgeProductsRequest.deleteOrphanProducts property

If delete\_orphan\_products is true, all Products that are not in any ProductSet will be deleted.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deleteOrphanProducts?: boolean | null;
```
